    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractDAO<T>
    Generic Abstract Data Access Object (DAO) class for operations.
    AddressValidator
    Validator for verifying that the shipping address in an order is not null.
    Bill
    Represents a billing record for an order.
    BillDao
    Data Access Object (DAO) for Bill records.
    Client
    Represents a client with personal information such as name, contact details, and address.
    ClientBLL
    Business Logic Layer class for managing Client entities.
    ClientDao
    Data Access Object (DAO) for Client entities.
    ConnectionFactory
    Class to manage database connections.
    ControllerClient
    Controller class responsible for managing client-related actions in the user interface.
    ControllerOrder
    Controller class for managing order operations.
    ControllerProduct
    Controller class for managing product-related interactions between the GUI and business logic.
    ControllerView
    Controls the main view of the application.
    EmailValidator
    Validator that checks if a client's email matches a valid pattern.
    Main
     
    NotEmptyValidator
    Validator class to ensure that all required fields of a Client object are not empty.
    NotEmptyValidatorProduct
    Validator class to check if the fields of a Product object are valid and not empty.
    OrderBLL
    Business Logic Layer class for managing Orders.
    OrderDao
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for Orders.
    Orders
    Represents an order placed by a client.
    Product
    Represents a product with details like id, name, description, price, and stock quantity.
    ProductBLL
    Business Logic Layer class for managing Product entities.
    ProductDao
    Data Access Object (DAO) for Product entities.
    StockValidator
    Validator for Product stock quantity.
    Validator<T>
    Generic interface for validating objects of type T.
    View
    Main window of the warehouse application.
    ViewClient
    Represents the GUI window for managing clients.
    ViewOrder
    Represents the GUI window for managing orders.
    ViewProduct
    Represents the GUI window for managing products.
